mapper.select: select no, from_no as "from", to_no as "to", contents, receiving, regdate from ( select row_number() over (order by no desc) rn, no, from_no, to_no, contents, receiving, regdate from messenger where to_no=#{no} order by regdate desc ) where rn >= #{pageVo.beginIndex} and rn <=#{pageVo.endIndex}
select no, from_no as "from", to_no as "to", contents, receiving, regdate from messenger where from_no=#{value} order by regdate desc
select no, from_no as "from", to_no as "to", contents, receiving, regdate from messenger where no=#{value}

select no, name, phone, email, address, to_date(birth, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as birth, department as dept, position, salary, photo, hiredate as hireDate, password, retiredate as retireDate, remarks, loginstate as loginState from Employee order by loginstate desc
select no, name, phone, email, address, to_date(birth, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as birth, department as "dept", position, salary, photo, hiredate, password, retiredate, remarks from Employee where no=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into messenger (no, from_no, to_no, contents, receiving, regdate) values (my_seq.nextval, #{from}, #{to}, #{contents}, 'n', sysdate)
